snippet: For a highly recognizable celebrity, Louis-Dreyfus still seems very normal. So in these photos, try as she might to be the glamorous Audrey Hepburn, she comes off as human - one of us.
abstract: For a highly recognizable celebrity, Louis-Dreyfus still seems very normal. So in these photos, try as she might to be the glamorous Audrey Hepburn, she comes off as human - one of us.

headline.main: Behind the Scenes of the Julia Louis-Dreyfus Photo Shoot
